author: Brian Fordham
comment: I noticed that the ambient outline mode is no longer available is there a reason it was dropped?

author: Cody Schadegg
comment: Phone battery not tracking; works on other faces but also not with 3 others from same developer. Turbo 2 and moto 360; fixed
title: Sharp

author: Dan Regev
comment: Since the last update the phone battery is not synchronized. Always at 0. Other watchfaces do not have this problem. I use LG G4 with LG G watch R

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello Sir, We tested this issue and our test phones and watches are synchronized well in the Watch's Phone battery. Sometimes if you use multiple watchfaces in your watch, it shows wrong battery level. Try to  change another watchface and then go back to Dark Chic. You may have right battery level or please turn off your watch and then apply again.

title: What happened?
